title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to include individuals who have exhausted all rights to emergency unemployment compensation under title IV of the Supplemental Appropriations Act, 2008 as a targeted group for purposes of the work opportunity tax credit.
content: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow employers a work opportunity tax credit for hiring a 99er . Reduces the amount of such credit for employees who remain employed for 120 hours, but less than 400 hours, and in the second year of employment.
